deathMsg: Strung upside down and slit open

preStm.addDummy: INSERT IGNORE INTO Mafia (`utc`,`username`,`role`,`alive`,`inactive`) VALUES ('0', 'DozenIncBOT', 'DUMMY', '0','-999') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `username`=`username`,`role`='DUMMY', `alive`='0';
burn: SELECT `username`,`role` FROM Mafia WHERE ((`role`='ASSASSIN' OR `role`='HANDLER') AND `comment`>0 AND NOT `username`=%s);
SELECT `username`,`role` FROM Mafia WHERE ((`role`='OPERATIVE' OR `role`='ANALYST') AND `comment`>0 AND NOT `username`=%s);
SELECT `username`,`role` FROM Mafia WHERE ((`role`='OPERATIVE' OR `role`='ANALYST') AND `alive`=1);
SELECT `username`,`role` FROM Mafia WHERE ((`role`='ASSASSIN' OR `role`='HANDLER') AND `alive`=1);
preStm.addUser: INSERT IGNORE INTO Mafia (`utc`,`username`,`role`, `loc`) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `username`=`username`;
cycle: UPDATE Mafia SET `alive`='0' WHERE username IN (SELECT vote FROM VoteCall GROUP BY VOTE HAVING COUNT(*) >= %s)
SELECT alive, COUNT(alive) AS count FROM Mafia GROUP BY alive ORDER BY alive desc;
SELECT role, COUNT(role) AS count FROM Mafia WHERE `alive`='1' GROUP BY role;
SELECT v.vote,m.role,count(*) AS cnt FROM VoteCall v, Mafia m WHERE v.vote = m.username GROUP BY v.vote HAVING cnt >= %s ORDER BY cnt DESC;
getList: SELECT `username` FROM Mafia WHERE (`alive`=0 AND NOT `username`='DozenIncBOT') ORDER BY `username` asc;
SELECT `username` FROM Mafia WHERE `alive`=1 ORDER BY `username` asc;
preStm.log: INSERT IGNORE INTO Log (`utc`,`username`,`action`) VALUES (%s, %s, %s) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `utc`=`utc`;
preStm.voteUser: INSERT INTO VoteCall (`username`, `vote`) VALUES(%s, %s) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `vote`=%s;

reply.addUser:
Hello u/{}, you have joined the game!

Your role is: *{}*.
Location: {}

SHHHH!!! Don't tell anyone! [Leave a comment so people know you're playing.](https://reddit.com/r/{}/comments/{})

Type all commands here.

You can leave the game by replying !leave to this message. **You cannot rejoin once the game has started!**

For help type !help.
Type !rules for the rules.
reply.burnedUser:
You have burned by u/{}!

You are now a spectator. Others can view how you died on your user flair.
cycle: You were inactive for two days and were automatically kicked from the game. Please wait until after the current game ends to rejoin.
You have escaped your hit! Take back revenge now!

err.cycle: You cannot vote at this time.
err.noBurnLeft: There is no one left to burn

err.noParticipate: To use this command, you must comment at least once per round to matain active status. Users who become inactive will be kicked.
err.notFound: Cannot find user, the user is not playing in the game, or has been killed.

err.role: You cannot use this command in this role.
err.spec: You are a spectator. You cannot use this command.

Note: The game {}

reply.gameEnd:
The game has ended.

Thank you for playing!

If you don't want to keep your game flair, you can change it back by clicking on the community options button.
reply.gamePause:
The game has been paused.

Please check the game thread more info.
reply.gameStart:
The game has started.

Investigate everyone around you and help your team survive! Don't forget to introduce yourself.

https://reddit.com/r/{}/comments/{}

You do not need to be present at all times to play. However, if you are inactive for more than 2 days you will be kicked for inactivity.
reply.hitAlert:
u/{}! A hit has been put on you!. 

You can escape this hit, no matter how much is on your head, by correctly voting the person who put a hit on you.
reply.newGame:
Hello u/{}, a new game is starting.

Your new role is: *{}*

If you wish to leave, type !leave. You cannot rejoin once the game has started.
reply.removeUser: You have left the game. You can rejoin before the game starts.
reply.showHelp:
List of available commands:
* !burn: Exposes one of your teammates randomly for a 100% credible Intelligence Report. Can only be used once
* !digup USERNAME: Gather intelligence on a user. For Handlers and Analysts only.
* !help: Shows help.
* !join: Join the game.
* !leave: Leave the game. You cannot rejoin once the game has started.
* !locate: Shows the location of the user.
* !rules: Shows the rules.
* !stats: Shows current number of players.
* !vote USERNAME: Vote on which user to be eliminated. For Assassins and Operatives only.
reply.showRules:
Rules:
1. Each user is given a secret role. You cannot see each otherâ€™s roles. You may choose to bluff or try to be truthful. Introduce yourself at the beginning of the game to set the scene.
2. You must investigate each other to determine who is on what side. Roles with investigative powers must share their intelligence to help inform others.
3. During the Day, MI6 agents can investigate and kill users who they suspect are in The Twelve. During the Night, The Twelve can investigate and kill users who they suspect are in MI6. Each Round lasts 6 hours. 2 Day/Night cycles, 4 rounds per day.
4. A user must receive at least 2 votes to be executed. Teams members are not immune to each other. You may end up killing your own team members out of suspicion. Users who do not actively participate in the investigation may not use the !vote or !digup commands.
5. At the end of each round, an announcement will be made about how many people are alive and how many were killed.
6.You must choose your allies carefully to seek out the enemy.
reply.voteUser: Your vote has been tallied. You can change your vote until the cycle ends.

sticky.burnUser: u/{} has burned their own member, u/{} for intelligence

You can choose to keep your flairs or remove them by clicking the Edit flair button in the community info tab.

sticky.restart:
